post.summary: Adds a Bankkonto to the given person.
post.description: Only accounts with a valid IBAN are accepted. If the BIC (Swift) code is present, and exactly one bank is identified by that code, the bank is associated with the account.

id.description: The id of the created bankkonto.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity (IBAN not valid or No Bank for BIC).

404.description: NotFound - The person or bankkonto could not be found.

patch.summary: Modifies a Bankkonto to the given person.
patch.description: Only accounts with a valid IBAN are accepted. The BIC (Swift) must exactly match one bank in the cca instance. The bank is associated with the account. **Attention** Changing a bank account usually means that workflows need to be taken into account (i.e. informing insurance companies). Those Workflows are **not** triggered by this operation.

get.summary: Retrieves Zusatzdaten for the selected Vertrag {verId}

patch.summary:
Edits the additional datafields for Vertrag {verId}. The data is an update - setting values for additional datafields: 
  **sets** the data if it was not set before
  **replaces** the data if it was already set
  **removes** the current value if the value is `null`
All additional datafields that are not part of the patch request are ignored.

422.description: Could not set Zusatzdaten

pagingPerPageParam.name: perPage
pagingPerPageParam.description: Indicates how many results should be returned per resultset page.

pagingPageNumberParam.name: page
pagingPageNumberParam.description: Requests a page specified by its page number. If the page requests it out of scope, the returned data-set will be empty.

orderByParam.name: orderBy
orderByParam.description: A string, in the form of: <name of property> "-" asc / desc - multiple orderBy parameters can be specified, and will be resolved in order of left to right.

filterByPropertiesParam.name: filter
filterByPropertiesParam.description: A string to specify filters for the list

content.description: The files Content. The Filename must be passed in the contents Content-Disposition Header.

oauth2sql.description: This token endpoint allows to use the standard `resourceowner password credentials` flow to retrieve accesstokens for CCA users, that use SQL Authentication type.

PersonBeziehungsart.description: Personbeziehungen sind gerichtete Kanten zwischen zwei Personen. Die PersonBeziehungsart beschreibt die Natur dieser Beziehung.Sofern eine Umkehrbeziehung existiert, ist diese die gegenlufige Kante zur ursprnglichen Personbeziehung.

name.description: Human readable identifier for the relationship

umkehrbeziehungArt.description: The inverse relation to the original relation, if one exists.

name.description: Human readable identifier for the relationship

PersonBeziehung.description: Personbeziehungen sind gerichtete Kanten zwischen zwei Personen. PersonA ist der Startknoten dieser gerichteten Kante und PersonB der Endknoten.

id.description: The identifier for this specific connection

personAId.description: Die Id der Person von dem die Beziehung ausgeht (Der Startknoten der gerichteten Kante)

personBId.description: Die Id der Person auf den die Beziehung zeigt (Der Endknoten der gerichteten Kante)

id.description: Id of the item to be edited. If left null or 0 the item will be created.

gueltiAb.description: If set, this determines the date after which the relationship is valid

gueltiBis.description: If set, this determines the date after which the relationship is invalid

marke.description: Brandname. Must be one of the provided list of `/configuration/auswahllisten/kfzMarke`

Id of the property data. If this is null or 0, the model is used to create a new data entry.

versicherungsSteuerProzent.description: The applicable insurance tax, depending on the insurance class. A default is provided by cca if not set.

wechselKennzeichen.description: Kennzeichnet HP Vertrge fr WechselKennzeichen. Die Berechnung der Prmien/Steuerberechung wird dann aufgrund der mit WechselKennzeichen gekennzeichenten KFZ - Risiken durchgefhrt.

variante.description: Tarfivariante lt Versicherer - zb. "mit Leihwagenverzicht" bei KFZ-Haftpflicht.

versicherungsSteuer2BerechnungsArt.description: Beschreibt wie die Motorenbezogene Versicherungssteuer berechnet wird. Entweder wird die Steuer aus den KFZ-Risiken berechnet.

versicherungsSteuer2.description: The second applicable insurance tax, depending on the insurance class. (i.e. Motorbezogene Versicherungssteuer).

versicherungsSteuerProzent.description: The applicable insurance tax, depending on the insurance class. A default is provided by cca if not set.

wechselKennzeichen.description: Kennzeichnet HP Vertrge fr WechselKennzeichen. Die Berechnung der Prmien/Steuerberechung wird dann aufgrund der mit WechselKennzeichen gekennzeichenten KFZ - Risiken durchgefhrt.

datenTyp.description: The datafields datatype + Text - free text (linebreaks are ignored!) + Datum - Date + Ganzzahl - integer + Gleitzahl - number / double + Enum - fixed enumeration of possible string values + JaNein - boolean value

rawValue.description:
The values string representation if set or null.
  * Text - the text 
  * Datum - The ISO 8601 formated datetime
  * Ganzzahl - Integer digits with optional negative sign (i.e. "1234", "-1234")
  * Gleitzahl - Integral and decimal digits with optional negative sign. Decimal-separator: "."
  * Enum - the enum identifier as string
  * JaNein - ("false"|"true")"

stringValue.description: The string value is set for the types [Text,Enum].

dateValue.description: The date value is set for [Datum].

integerValue.description: The integer value is set for [Ganzzahl].

searchTerm.description: Fulltext Search term. Words shorter than 3 characters will be ignored.

searchMode.description:
CCAOnline supports two searchmodes.
  * Tier 1: is a fast search mode, that only includes properties directly associated with the enitity (like name, info, ...)- This is only supported for Person, Vertrag, Schaden
  * Tier 2: provides extensive search results.

entityFilter.description: List of entity types that should be included in the search result.  Attention: Tier1 Search only support Person, Vertrag and Schaden. All other entities will be ignored in tier1 Mode.

filterFiliale.description: If Filialen are configured this option can be used to only return items, that are administered by the users filiale.

VertragTypesEnum.description: Type of the Contract (offer, proposal or contract)

ccaTabelle.description: The cca table that relates to the selectionlist.

id.description: The CCA Id of the selectionlist item.

text.description: The label for the selectionlist item (localized).

omdsBezeichnung.description: The label of the omds code.

id.description: The cca id of that item.

text.description: The cca label for that item (localized).

correlationId.description: A for the request unique ID.

detail.description: A for the user detailed readable error message.

instance.description: The ressource where the error occurred.

title.description: A for the user summarized readable error message.

type.description: A URI which describes the Problemtype.

first.description: URl to the first page of results.

last.description: URl to the last page of results

next.description: URl to the immediate next page of results. If empty the current page is the last page of results.

pageSize.description: Max. number of items returned by a page.

prev.description: URl to the immediate previous page of results. If empty the current page is the first page of results.

totalCount.description: Total number of items in the list.

id.description: The Id of the risk

antragNr.description: Proposal number Wenn die Antragsnummer nicht befllt ist, wird sie durch das System automatisch vergeben.
